snippet: An artist’s modern-day rendering of an angel as a cathedral statue, with cellphone included, has dueling phone numbers.
abstract: 'S Hertogenbosch Journal; anonymous couple in 's Hertogenbosch, Netherlands, establish free phone number for an unconventional statue of an angel using a cellphone outside St John the Evangelist Cathedral; number has become so popular that Catholic Church officials who administer the church have set up official number for the angel, for a fee.
lead_paragraph: An artist’s modern-day rendering of an angel as a cathedral statue, with cellphone included, has dueling phone numbers.

headline.seo: A Dutch Church’s Angel Is in Demand
headline.main: A Dutch Angel’s Cellphone Number Is in Demand
headline.print_headline: A Little Dutch Angel’s Cellphone Number Is in Demand
